TestDescription.name: Multiple vulnerabilities fixed in PHP versions 5.5.12 and 5.4.28
TestDescription.Description: List of vulnerabilities that were fixed in PHP versions 5.5.12 and 5.4.28:[break] [break] Core:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #61019 (Out of memory on command stream_get_contents).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #64330 (stream_socket_server() creates wrong Abstract Namespace UNIX sockets).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #66182 (exit in stream filter produces segfault).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #66736 (fpassthru broken).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #67024 (getimagesize should recognize BMP files with negative heighty).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #67043 (substr_compare broke by previous change).[/li] [/ul] cURL:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66562 (curl_exec returns differently than curl_multi_getcontent).[/li] [/ul] Date:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66721 (__wakeup of DateTime segfaults when invalid object data is supplied).[/li] [/ul] Embed:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #65715 (php5embed.lib isn't provided anymore).[/li] [/ul] Fileinfo:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66987 (Memory corruption in fileinfo ext / bigendian).[/li] [/ul] FPM:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66482 (unknown entry 'priority' in php-fpm.conf).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #67060 (possible privilege escalation due to insecure default configuration). (CVE-2014-0185)).[/li] [/ul] Json:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66021 (Blank line inside empty array/object when JSON_PRETTY_PRINT is set).[/li] [/ul] LDAP:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed issue with null bytes in LDAP bindings.[/li] [/ul] mysqli:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed problem in mysqli_commit()/mysqli_rollback() with second parameter (extra comma) and third parameters (lack of escaping).[/li] [/ul] Openssl:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66942 (memory leak in openssl_seal()).[/li] [li]Fixed bug #66952 (memory leak in openssl_open()).[/li] [/ul] SimpleXML:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66084 (simplexml_load_string() mangles empty node name).[/li] [/ul] SQLite:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #66967 (Updated bundled libsqlite to 3.8.4.3)[/li] [/ul] XSL:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed bug #53965 (<xsl:include> cannot find files with relative paths when loaded with "file://")[/li] [/ul] Apache2 Handler SAPI:[break] [ul] [li]Fixed Apache log issue caused by APR's lack of support for %zu (APR issue https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=56120)[/li] [/ul]
TestDescription.Impact: Multiple vulnerabilities were fixed with this update (impact is different for each vulnerability).
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of PHP.
